EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - SF
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in San Francisco. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—San Francisco, CA Thursday, April 21, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/sanfrancisco]]>
Location: Pivotal Office—San Francisco, CA 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor San Francisco, CA 94103 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal/@37.7817873,-122.4039108,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x108e933f003c99e3]]>
Coming from Caltrain: From San Francisco Station: - Head northeast toward 4th Street - Turn left onto 4th Street (0.6 of a mile) - Turn left onto Howard Street (0.1 of a mile) Arrive at 875 Howard Street (Pivotal office 5th Floor) http://www.caltrain.com/ <[[http://www.caltrain.com/]]>
Coming from Bart: From Market Street Bart Station: - Head northeast on Market Street (0.4 of a mile) - Turn right onto 5th Street (0.2 of a mile) - Turn left onto Howard Street Arrive at 875 Howard Street (Pivotal office 5th Floor) https://www.bart.gov/ <[[https://www.bart.gov/]]>
Parking: Fifth & Mission / Yerba Buena Parking Garage <[[http://www.fifthandmission.com/home.htm]]>
Questions? Contact Jamie De Martini at jdemartini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdemartini@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
